languages.text: "Я молил его о спасении, но он просто ушел... Почему?!" {n}Парень закашливается и принимается истерично выцарапывать на спекшейся плоти символы, что вы видели.{/n} "Пожалуйста, помогите мне! Я хочу жить..."
"I begged him to save me, but he just turned and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols you saw into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."
languages.original_text: "Я молил его о спасении, но он просто ушел... Почему?!" {n}Парень закашливается и принимается истерично выцарапывать на спекшейся плоти символы, что вы видели.{/n} "Пожалуйста, помогите мне! Я хочу жить..."

traits.locale_text: "I begged him to save me, but he just turned around and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."
"I begged him to save me, but he just turned around and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."

"I begged him to save me, but he just turned and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols you saw into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."

languages.text: « Je l'ai supplié de me sauver, mais il s'est contenté de partir... Pourquoi ? » {n}Il tousse et se met à griffer à même sa peau le symbole que vous avez vu.{/n} « Je vous en supplie, aidez-moi ! Je veux vivre... »
languages.original_text: "I begged him to save me, but he just turned and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols you saw into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ai supplié de me sauver, mais il s'est contenté de partir... Pourquoi ? » {n}Il tousse et se met à griffer à même sa peau le symbole que vous avez vu.{/n} « Je vous en supplie, aidez-moi ! Je veux vivre... »

languages.text: «Le rogué que me salvara, pero me dio la espalda y se fue... ¿por qué?». {n}Tose y se araña febrilmente, grabando los mismos símbolos que has visto en su carne.{/n} «Por favor, ¡ayuda! Quiero vivir...».
languages.original_text: "I begged him to save me, but he just turned and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols you saw into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."

traits.locale_text: «Le rogué que me salvara, pero me dio la espalda y se fue... ¿por qué?». {n}Tose y se araña febrilmente, grabando los mismos símbolos que has visto en su carne.{/n} «Por favor, ¡ayuda! Quiero vivir...».

languages.text: 「助けて欲しいと、頼んだのに…彼は、背を向けて、いなくなった…なぜだ？」{n}男は咳き込んで、前に見たものと同じシンボルを夢中で肉体にガリガリと刻み始める。{/n}「どうか、助けて…！生き、たい…」
languages.original_text: "I begged him to save me, but he just turned and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols you saw into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."

traits.locale_text: 「助けて欲しいと、頼んだのに…彼は、背を向けて、いなくなった…なぜだ？」{n}男は咳き込んで、前に見たものと同じシンボルを夢中で肉体にガリガリと刻み始める。{/n}「どうか、助けて…！生き、たい…」

languages.text: “我求他救我一命，可那这个人却转身走了……这是怎么回事？”{n}他咳嗽起来，拼命抓起了他自己身上同样的符号。{/n}“求求你，救救我！我不想死……”
languages.original_text: "I begged him to save me, but he just turned and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols you saw into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."

traits.locale_text: “我求他救我一命，可那这个人却转身走了……这是怎么回事？”{n}他咳嗽起来，拼命抓起了他自己身上同样的符号。{/n}“求求你，救救我！我不想死……”

languages.text: "Ich habe ihn angefleht, mich zu retten, aber er drehte sich einfach um und ging ... Warum?" {n}Er hustet und kratzt sich wie im Fieber dieselben Symbole ins Fleisch, die du schon gesehen hast.{/n} "Bitte helft mir! Ich will leben ..."
languages.original_text: "I begged him to save me, but he just turned and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols you saw into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ihn angefleht, mich zu retten, aber er drehte sich einfach um und ging ... Warum?" {n}Er hustet und kratzt sich wie im Fieber dieselben Symbole ins Fleisch, die du schon gesehen hast.{/n} "Bitte helft mir! Ich will leben ..."

languages.text: "Beni kurtarması için yalvardım ama çekip gitti... Niye?" {n}Öksürüp sonrasında daha evvel gördüğün sembolleri derisine kazımaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ne olur, yardım edin! Yaşamak istiyorum..."
languages.original_text: "I begged him to save me, but he just turned and left... Why?" {n}He coughs and starts feverishly scratching the same symbols you saw into his flesh.{/n} "Please, help me! I want to live..."
